channel.title: CVE Feed for ZoomIt -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZoomIt -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-39316|2024-09-17T04:04:13.363Z -- zoomit -- zoomsounds%20-%20wordpress%20wave%20audio%20player%20with%20playlist
item.description: The Zoomsounds plugin <= 6.45 for WordPress allows arbitrary files, including sensitive configuration files such as wp-config.php, to be downloaded via the `dzsap_download` action using directory traversal in the `link` parameter.
